Culurgionis are just our Polish "pierogi". We can put anything in them - cabbage, potatoes, apples, strawberries, blackcurrants... Pasta is not originally from china, they use a different dough and italian pasta is not derived from any chinese contamination. The two types of food evolved similar in some aspects but separately. The myth of marco polo importing pasta from china is a lie invented years ago and even if the first kind of pasta was made in china it doesn't mean that italian/mediterranean pasta is an imitation and loses its dignity.
